name: HTTrack Website Copier File
summary: Learn about .WHTT files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

description: A WHTT file is an offline version of a website which is downloaded using the HTTrack Website Copier software. It contains all the contents of a website including HTML webpages, images, stylesheets, links and directories. All the pages of a website are downloaded recursively and saved to disc as offline mirror. When a website is downloaded by the HTTrack software, it can be viewed offline without the need of being connected to the internet. In order to view the downloaded website, simply open page of the mirrored website in the browser and each image/link will be loaded properly.

A WHTT file is a website downloaded with HTTrack, a free offline browser program. It contains all the webpages, directories, and images that comprise a website. WHTT files are used to view a website when not connected to the Internet.
